channel.title: Bill Harris, Chief Executive Officer, 2012 Republican National Convention
channel.description: Bill Harris, Chief Executive Officer, 2012 Republican National Convention (Remarks as Prepared for Delivery)

item.title: Thank you, and welcome to the 2012 Republican National Convention.
item.author: Bill Harris, Chief Executive Officer, 2012 Republican National Convention

item.title: We are pleased to be in the great state of Florida, and especially right here in Tampa Bay.
item.author: Bill Harris, Chief Executive Officer, 2012 Republican National Convention

item.title: I have had the privilege of living and working here for over a year now, and I am confident you all will enjoy your visit this week.
item.author: Bill Harris, Chief Executive Officer, 2012 Republican National Convention

item.title: There are quite a few people who have been instrumental in getting us to this point.
item.author: Bill Harris, Chief Executive Officer, 2012 Republican National Convention

item.title: First of all, Governor Scott, thank you for welcoming us into your state. Mayor Buckhorn, thank you for opening your community to us.
item.author: Bill Harris, Chief Executive Officer, 2012 Republican National Convention

item.title: The people of Tampa Bay have been incredibly welcoming, and we appreciate their hospitality and the great support of the host committee.
item.author: Bill Harris, Chief Executive Officer, 2012 Republican National Convention

item.title: I'd like to acknowledge the hard work and dedication of the RNC team, especially Chairman Reince Priebus and COA chairman Alec Poitevint.
item.author: Bill Harris, Chief Executive Officer, 2012 Republican National Convention

item.title: And, while there are far too many people involved in this endeavor to thank everyone individually, I'd like to thank the 106 members of our staff, the thousands of volunteers, and acknowledge our chief operating officer, Mike Miller, who has been the foundation of our efforts.
item.author: Bill Harris, Chief Executive Officer, 2012 Republican National Convention

item.title: This is the third convention I've had the privilege of running and the 11th convention I've attended.
item.author: Bill Harris, Chief Executive Officer, 2012 Republican National Convention

item.title: I believe the convention is an important institution, not just for our candidates or for our Party, but for our democracy. Right now, our men and women in uniform around the world stand in defense of our freedoms. Our right to select a leader of our choosing is one of the most important freedoms they work to uphold.
item.author: Bill Harris, Chief Executive Officer, 2012 Republican National Convention

item.title: This convention is a critical step in that selection process.
item.author: Bill Harris, Chief Executive Officer, 2012 Republican National Convention

item.title: This convention will enable Governor Romney and Representative Ryan to communicate their message and vision for the country with the American people.
item.author: Bill Harris, Chief Executive Officer, 2012 Republican National Convention

item.title: As millions tune in and begin to pay attention to the fundamental issues at stake in this campaign, it is from this stage that they will begin to form their opinions and make their decisions.
item.author: Bill Harris, Chief Executive Officer, 2012 Republican National Convention

item.title: So, I trust you will not only enjoy the next three days, but that you will appreciate the important role you are in playing in our democratic process.
item.author: Bill Harris, Chief Executive Officer, 2012 Republican National Convention

item.title: Thank you.
item.author: Bill Harris, Chief Executive Officer, 2012 Republican National Convention
Bill Harris, Chief Executive Officer, 2012 Republican National Convention
